p: Examining the AGI model results by month reveals the incidence of cryptosporidiosis and giardiasis is expected to decrease in May to August by up to 31% compared to the historical baseline, but increase by up to 29% in October to March (Fig.Â 3). The range in future projections compared to historical monthly case counts typically differed by 10 to 20% across climate models but the direction of change was consistent regardless of the model.
